aboutUs.description: We are a young, newly created company but with extensive experience in designing and renovating all types of spaces. We work directly with our own trusted team of professionals, which always guarantees maximum quality in terms of finishes and deadlines. Our budgets are very competitive, in line with the current market.

commitment.description: M2.Studio  develops its activities within  standards of excellence , in terms of  environmental care . Therefore, each person who is within the client's property, or outside of it, but in their representation, without exception, must fulfill their responsibilities within the framework of  ecological commitment  in accordance with current legal regulations, preventing environmental pollution in all projects where it executes its activities.
commitment.listIntro: For which it assumes the following commitments:
points: Actively continue with a pollution prevention policy to minimize the impact of our operations.
Comply with client policies and procedures, as well as all applicable laws and regulations.
Make strategic efforts to maximize our energy efficiency and use of natural resources, through the management of our energy use, water consumption and waste generation.
Responsibly manage our operation sites to protect ecosystems and biodiversity, as well as maximize our contribution to nature conservation.
Maintain open and effective communication channels with our employees, clients, community and all those who work with us.
Provide necessary resources for instruction, training and supervision, to properly manage environmental aspects of our operations.
Plan, review and evaluate our environmental performance against measurable objectives to drive continuous improvement.
commitment.conclusion: M2.Studio  will establish and maintain an environmental management program and/or plan that includes objectives and procedures for carrying out operations in all its projects and facilities, promoting environmental awareness.

ourWay.staticTextDescription: M2 was born as a result of our passion for everything that is innovative,  sustainable  and beautiful.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: The construction process from start to finish
points: We Meet After contacting us, we call you to set up a meeting date.
We take measurements, photos and understand your needs.
We prepare your project without any commitment or cost.
We present your project.
Plans: Current Status and New Distribution Proposal
Infographics: New Virtual Design
Materials Proposal: Design
Smart Budget: The first budget as close to reality as possible
Book Our Services: To reserve your renovation in a time frame, and for us to work 100% on your project, a reservation is necessary.
Adjustments and Comparisons: We move on to choosing final materials to create the definitive budget.
We Prepare Your Renovation and Execute It: We go from digital and paper to reality. Time for action!

designFinishes.title: Design and Choice of Finishes
points: We propose a new distribution and design of 'Your Space'.
We propose possible finishes and prepare samples so you can physically check the design material.
We work with the best brands and the most suitable ones for each project. Our long journey has allowed us to gather a wide variety of trusted suppliers.
After the selection process, we send you a dossier with everything for you to confirm that everything is correct. This way, we avoid errors and everything is clear.

technology.title: Construction + Technology
points: We establish start, completion and delivery dates.
We prepare a Gantt chart (diagram that allows planning the execution of the work) to inform you each week what actions we will take.
At the end of each week, we attach photos and/or videos of the progress through the channel that you indicate is best for you (email or WhatsApp).
technology.info: We will keep you informed of any news or changes with a click of your mobile.

reform.label: Renovation
reform.description: Before starting a renovation, it is crucial to take into account some things to facilitate our work and help us connect with our clients' true needs.

importantPoints.label: Most Important Points
importantPoints.description: The Budget: Before starting any renovation, you must consider the budget. It is important to be clear about what you want or can invest in your renovation. It must be a realistic amount, in line with your reality.

design.label: Design
design.description: Another very important point to consider is design. The clearer you are about your needs, the more we can help you achieve the desired space.

deadlines.label: Deadlines
deadlines.description: It is important to know when it is convenient for us to carry out your work so that we can try to fit it in and not make it a problem. At m2.Studio, we will indicate the time needed to prepare and execute your work. For us it is important to meet the established deadlines, so the client must be aware that unforeseen changes on their part delay a work and once all the details are established, we try to stick to what was agreed.

professionals.label: Professionals
professionals.description: Having a team of qualified and certified professionals with experience to carry out the renovation is of utmost importance. Our m2.Studio team offers you the guarantee of optimal finishes. Always ensuring to minimize complications and errors from the beginning.

security.label: Security
security.description: For us, the safety of our team is extremely important, which is why we ensure that our entire team has what is necessary to tackle each renovation without incidents and with the greatest possible safety. During the renovation, it is important to take safety into account. We ensure that our professionals have the necessary training to carry out our works.
